LanguageData.VGSE_ExtractOxygenDesc: Extract 10 oxygen canisters from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VSGE_OxygenValveDesc: Switches oxygen flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.VGSE_ExtractAstrofuelDesc: Extract 150 astrofuel from the tank. A pawn will come to extract it.
LanguageData.VSGE_AstrofuelValveDesc: Switches astrofuel flow on/off. A pawn will come open/close the valve.
